Terms of Service

Last Updated: February 15, 2026

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using HavenKeep (“the Service”), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service (“Terms”). If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Service.

2. Description of Service

HavenKeep is a warranty tracking application that helps you:

  • Track product warranties and expiration dates
  • Store receipts and warranty documentation
  • Receive reminders before warranties expire
  • Manage items across multiple properties

3. User Accounts

3.1 Account Creation

You must create an account to use the Service. You agree to:

  • Provide accurate and complete information
  • Maintain the security of your account credentials
  • Notify us immediately of unauthorized use
  • Be responsible for all activity under your account

3.2 Account Termination

We may suspend or terminate your account if you:

  • Violate these Terms
  • Engage in fraudulent activity
  • Abuse or misuse the Service
  • Fail to pay subscription fees

4. Subscription and Payments

4.1 Free Plan

  • Up to 5 items
  • Basic warranty tracking
  • Email reminders
  • No credit card required

4.2 Premium Plan

Premium is available at $2.99/month or $24/year (save 33%). Premium includes:

  • Unlimited items & properties
  • AI receipt scanning (OCR)
  • PDF, CSV & email export
  • Smart multi-stage reminders
  • Priority support & onboarding

4.3 Billing

  • Subscriptions are billed monthly or annually in advance
  • Automatic renewal unless canceled
  • Price changes will be communicated 30 days in advance
  • Payments processed securely through Stripe

4.4 Refunds

We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your payment, no questions asked. You may cancel at any time to prevent future charges.

5. User Content

5.1 Your Data

You retain ownership of all data you upload (item information, receipts, photos). By using the Service, you grant us a license to:

  • Store and process your data to provide the Service
  • Use anonymized, aggregated data for analytics and improvements
  • Display your data back to you across devices

5.2 Prohibited Content

You may not upload:

  • Illegal or harmful content
  • Content that violates others' rights
  • Malware or malicious code
  • Excessive or spam content

6. Acceptable Use

You agree not to:

  • Reverse engineer or attempt to extract source code
  • Use automated scripts or bots to access the Service
  • Attempt to bypass security measures
  • Interfere with other users' access
  • Use the Service for illegal purposes
  • Resell or redistribute the Service

7. Intellectual Property

The Service, including its design, features, and content (excluding your user content), is owned by HavenKeep and protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute our intellectual property without permission.

8. Disclaimers and Limitations

8.1 Service Availability

The Service is provided “as is” without warranties. We do not guarantee:

  • Uninterrupted or error-free operation
  • 100% uptime (we target 99.9%)
  • Data accuracy from barcode/OCR scanning
  • Warranty validity or coverage details

8.2 Limitation of Liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, HavenKeep is not liable for:

  • Indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
  • Loss of data or profits
  • Missed warranty deadlines
  • Third-party warranty claim denials

Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid us in the 12 months preceding the claim.

8.3 Warranty Information

HavenKeep is a tracking tool only. We do not:

  • Provide warranty services or repairs
  • Guarantee warranty coverage or claim approval
  • Offer legal advice about warranty rights
  • Verify manufacturer warranty terms

Always verify warranty details with the manufacturer or retailer.

9. Third-Party Services

The Service integrates with third-party services (barcode databases, OCR providers). We are not responsible for their availability, accuracy, or terms of service.

10. Indemnification

You agree to indemnify and hold HavenKeep harmless from any claims arising from:

  • Your use of the Service
  • Your violation of these Terms
  • Your violation of others' rights

11. Governing Law

These Terms are governed by the laws of the United States, without regard to conflict of law provisions. Any disputes will be resolved in the appropriate courts.

12. Changes to Terms

We may update these Terms from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated via email or in-app notification 30 days in advance. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

13. Severability

If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid, the remaining provisions will remain in full effect.

14. Contact Information

For questions about these Terms, contact us at:

  • Email: legal@havenkeep.com
  • Support: support@havenkeep.com
